title: WTB: T-227 Marquard to complete set
author: ZiggerZagger

posts.post_title: WTB: T-227 Marquard to complete set
posts.post_content:
Looking for a T-227 Rube Marquard to complete the baseball subset for this issue  (see pic for progress to date).

It's been fun looking for nice examples, and the search for the T-227 Cobb was what got me into vintage collecting to begin with.

Would like to find a graded example of the Marquard, probably at a grade of SGC 2 or higher.  Would absolutely consider PSA as well.


Thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=302720&d=1516323578[/IMG]
I can't believe you settled for such a mediocre Cobb.  :D
absolutely beautiful cards.  Forget technical grades.  Such a tough set.  Good luck on the Marquard!
